header.title: Michael Thomsen
header.subtitle: Experienced Web Developer
header.text: Skilled developer working with both big and small companies. Experienced in developing websites in both static websites with frameworks like VueJS and ReactJS and traditional websites with CMS' like WordPress or Joomla.

about.title: A little about me
about.text: After multiple years working as a front-end and web developer for big and small companies, I moved to a freelance role to be location free. I am hardworking, reliable and honest, always strive to deliver above expectations and give you the assurance your site, brand etc. is in good hands.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio
portfolio.text: My portfolio spans both minor and bigger sites developed primarily as static sites with NuxtJS/NextJS and/or (headless) WordPress sites (read about the benefits of a static site here). Take a look and reach out if you want to work together.
